titleStmt.title: A poets vision, and a princes glorie Dedicated to the high and mightie prince, Iames, King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland. Written by Thomas Greene Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Greene, Thomas, Town clerk of Stratford upon Avon.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
